attributes.action: Bring a law in to stop train strikes
attributes.additional_details: Bring a law in to stop train strikes as they are putting Women's lives at risk as they are having to seek alternative less secure methods of travel
attributes.background: Bring a law in to stop train strikes as they are putting Women's lives at risk as they are having to seek alternative less secure methods of travel

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618125
